divs: Sighting DetailsI believe I have located a spectacular extraterrestrial anomaly that was probably overlooked or missed by NASA. Otherwise it would have probably gotten airbrushed out. This is a definite constructed probable vehicle, no mistake about it, a clear view, not fuzzy.Here is where it's located Zoom in big time and you'll be astounded--- Planet Mercury, year2008 m16 PIA11356.jpg Messenger's fly by Jan 16 2008 en0108821483m.pnj At first you see a big dark crator but whe you zoom in a little dull white spot appears, keep zooming in and then behold. 1. I located the object on line 2. Looking for anomalies on planetary surfaces 3. white color 4. It appears to be a somewhat geometric shaped long vehicle with two protusions on each side. It sits motionless on the ground. A small same colored piece lays off one end ,maybe broken off due to a possible landing,( my own thought). 5. Enthusiasm I videotaped it for my own record 6. It's there for all to see. Thanks (Nightsky)
Summary: This a craft sitting on the floor of a crator on planet Mercury
